A newly designed interface introducing various interactive features to your Privilege Club account or Basic Profile with Qatar Airways:
· Privilege Club accounts now include personalized and dynamic features such as the Benefits Wheel and Qpoints chart, Qmiles earnings, personal traveling stats, travel map and more.
· User-friendly profile design allowing you to update your personal details and set your preferences with ease.
· Updated dashboard allowing you to view and manage all your bookings and upcoming trips in one place.
· Ability to conveniently book flights and browse qatarairways.com while logged in.

Your flight details is now upfront in your home screen. One tap to manage your booking or Online Check-in or Digital boarding pass. Stay connected with your flight in seamless experience. Also, now you can use any Latin keyboard to complete your booking. Due to technical and compliance reason all social media logins (Google, Facebook and Twitter) will be temporarily disabled and will be made available in the next release.

· We continue with our commitment as your travel companion to book and travel with ease.
· Get notified, never miss an offer! You can sign up to receive our latest offers and manage all notifications in your settings.
· Login is now fast and easy when you use your Apple Sign In, Face ID.
· You can now redeem your travel voucher to book a flight on the app.

Either you are a frequent user of our App or a brand new downloader, there is always some greatness awaiting for you.

· We are introducing a new fare benefits to best cover your needs. Your flight will be more enjoyable and comfortable with our new packages.
· Redeem your voucher to confirm your on-hold booking. Now you can to use your voucher even if the voucher value is more than your booking cost. The voucher balance remains for your future bookings.

Together, we go further. Thank you for your help finding bugs to improve your in-app experience.

General bug fixes and performance enhancements

· Never miss an upgrade offer! Your trip card allows you to upgrade your ticket from the home screen.
· Hello count down timer! Confirm your booking on hold with one touch before it expires.
· Enroll in Privilege Club while booking in the app to benefit from exclusive rewards and access your digital membership card.
· We have also enhanced our app’s performance with further stability tweaks to make your experience even better. Help us to improve and let us know about your app experience at mobilepod@qatarairways.com.qa
